hadiths.text: Narrated Ghailan: Anas said, "I do not find (now-a-days) things as they were (practiced) at the time of the Prophet." Somebody said "The prayer (is as it was.)" Anas said, "Have you not done in the prayer what you have done?

chapter.eng-name: Not offering As-Salat (the prayers) at its stated fixed time
